amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $1 million in the bill for the Legal Services Corporation (LSC) and to replace it with language prohibiting use of funds in the bill for LSC.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to strip out the extra $1M for Legal Services Corporation (LSC) and replaces that with a limitation against funding for LSC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 217 (Roll no. 18).

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Duncan (SC) to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 217 (Roll no. 18).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Duncan (SC) to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
